resources.string:
Trini Feng is a high school senior at Crystal Lake South.
 
She's currently in the Advanced Mobile Apps class and took AP Computer Science A her freshman year.
 
She hopes to major in computer science with a focus on linguistics in the future.
 
In her free time, she likes music, writing, and reading! She's always looking for new Spotify recs. :)
 
Favorite TV show: Parks and Rec
 
Favorite movie: Inception
